a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Trust in doctors and nurses vs. disagree that vaccines are safe, 2020
The share of people who responded "a lot" or "some" to the question "How much do you trust doctors and nurses
in your country? Do you trust them a lot, some, not much, or not at all?". This is measured against the share of
people who answered "strong disagree" or "somewhat disagree" to the statement "Vaccines are safe."
Share of people who disagree vaccines are safe
Trust doctors and nurses in this country
Data source: Wellcome Global Monitor (2020); Our World In Data; Wellcome Global Monitor (2019)
